articles.title: Apple faces second downgrade this week as iPhone performance concerns intensify: Report | Mint - Mint
articles.description: As 2024 commenced, Apple already had the fewest bullish recommendations among big tech stocks, according to Bloomberg data.

articles.author: Rakesh Patil
articles.title: Taking Stock: Market bounces back; Sensex up 491 pts, Nifty at 21,650 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Bajaj Finance, NTPC, ONGC, Tata Consumer and IndusInd Bank are among the top gainers on the Nifty, while losers included BPCL, LTIMindtree, Dr Reddy's Laboratories, HCL Technologies and Hero MotoCorp
articles.content:
After two days of selling, the equity indices bounced back on January 4 with Nifty above 21,600 amid buying across the sectors and broader indices.
At close, the Sensex was up 490.97 points or 0.69 … [+3197 chars]
